All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadRequestException
A custom exception class thrown to indicate a bad request received by the system.
BadRequestResponse
Represents a HTTP 400 Bad Request response format for API responses.
Buy
Represents a buy object within the system.
BuyController
This class represents a controller responsible for handling operations related to purchases.
BuyControllerTest
 
BuyOrder
Represents a purchase order associated with a buy.
BuyParseDate
Utility class for parsing dates used in the Buy system.
BuyParseException
A custom exception class extending ParseException to indicate errors during buy date parsing.
BuyRepository
Spring Data Mongo repository for managing `Buy` entities.
BuyService
Service layer class responsible for managing `Buy` entities.
BuyServiceTest
 
FileRequestResponse
 
FileService
Service class responsible for parsing an input stream representing a file into a structured map of Buy objects.
GenericsInterfaceService<T>
Defines a generic service interface that provides basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for entities of type `T`.
InternalServerErrorResponse
Represents a HTTP 500 Internal Server Error response format for API responses.
NotFoundResponse
Represents a HTTP 404 Not Found response format for API responses.
OpenAPIConfiguration
This class configures and returns a custom OpenAPI instance for integration with Swagger.
Product
Represents a product within the system.
PropertiesVertLog
This class represents property settings for integration with Swagger in the specific context of the VertLog system.
ResourceNotFoundException
A custom exception class extending RuntimeException to indicate that a requested resource could not be found.
VertLogApplication
This class represents the main entry point for the Vertlog application.
VertLogApplicationTests
This class represents a test suite for the VertLog application.
